verses.verse: On<WG2250> that<WG1565> day<WG2250> Jesus<WG2424> went<WG1831> out of<WG575> the house,<WG3614> and sat<WG2521> by<WG3844> the seaside.<WG2281>

Great<WG4183> multitudes<WG3793> gathered to<WG4314> him,<WG846> so that<WG5620> he<WG846> entered<WG1684> into<WG1519> a boat,<WG4143> and<WG2532> sat,<WG2521> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the<WG3793> multitude<WG3793> stood<WG2476> on<WG1909> the beach.<WG123>
He<WG2532> spoke<WG2980> to them<WG846> many things<WG4183> in<WG1722> parables,<WG3850> saying,<WG3004> "Behold,<WG2400> a farmer<WG4687> went out<WG1831> to sow.<WG4687>
As<WG1722> he<WG846> sowed,<WG3303> some<WG3739> seeds fell<WG4098> by<WG3844> the roadside,<WG3598> and<WG2532> the birds<WG4071> came<WG2064> and<WG2532> devoured<WG2719> them.<WG846>

Others<WG243> fell<WG4098> on<WG1909> rocky ground,<WG1093> where<WG3699> they didn't<WG3756> have<WG2192> much<WG4183> soil,<WG1093> and<WG2532> immediately<WG2112> they sprang up,<WG1816> because<WG1223> they had<WG2192> no<WG3361> depth<WG899> of earth.<WG1093>
When<WG1161> the sun<WG2246> had risen,<WG393> they were scorched.<WG2739> Because<WG1223> they had<WG2192> no<WG3361> root,<WG4491> they withered away.<WG3583>
Others<WG243> fell<WG4098> among<WG1909> thorns.<WG173> The<WG2532> thorns<WG173> grew up<WG305> and<WG2532> choked<WG638> them.<WG846>

Others<WG243> fell<WG4098> on<WG1909> good<WG2570> soil,<WG2570> and<WG2532> yielded<WG1325> fruit:<WG3303> some<WG3739> one hundred<WG1161> times as much,<WG3739> some sixty,<WG1161> and some<WG3739> thirty.<WG5144>
He who has<WG2192> ears<WG3775> to hear,<WG191> let him hear.<WG191>"
The disciples<WG3101> came,<WG4334> and<WG2532> said<WG2036> to him,<WG1223> "Why<WG5101> do you<WG2980> speak to them<WG846> in<WG1722> parables?<WG3850>"

He answered<WG611> them,<WG846> "To you<WG5213> it is given<WG1325> to know<WG1097> the mysteries<WG3466> of the Kingdom<WG932> of Heaven,<WG3772> but<WG1161> it is<WG1325> not<WG3756> given<WG1325> to them.<WG1565>

For<WG1063> whoever<WG3748> has,<WG2192> to him<WG846> will be given,<WG1325> and<WG2532> he will have abundance,<WG4052> but<WG1161> whoever<WG3748> doesn't<WG3756> have,<WG2192> from<WG575> him<WG846> will be taken away<WG142> even<WG2532> that<WG3739> which he has.<WG2192>

Therefore<WG5124> I<WG2980> speak to them<WG846> in<WG1722> parables,<WG3850> because<WG3754> seeing<WG991> they<WG991> don't<WG3756> see,<WG991> and<WG2532> hearing,<WG191> they don't<WG3756> hear,<WG191> neither<WG3761> do they understand.<WG4920>

In<WG1909> them<WG846> the prophecy<WG4394> of Isaiah<WG2268> is fulfilled,<WG378> which says,<WG3004> <WG189> 'By hearing you will hear,<WG191> and<WG2532> will in<WG3756> no<WG1492> way understand;<WG4920> Seeing<WG991> you will see,<WG991> and<WG2532> will<WG1492> in<WG3756> no<WG3361> way perceive:<WG1492>

for<WG1063> this<WG5127> people<WG2992>'s heart<WG2588> has grown callous,<WG3975> <WG2532> their ears<WG3775> are dull of<WG917> hearing,<WG191> they have closed<WG2576> their<WG846> eyes;<WG3788> or else perhaps<WG3379> they might perceive<WG1492> with<WG3788> their eyes,<WG3788> <WG2532> hear<WG191> with<WG3775> their ears,<WG3775> <WG2532> understand<WG4920> with<WG2588> their heart,<WG2588> and<WG2532> should turn again;<WG1994> and<WG2532> I would heal<WG2390> them.<WG846>'
"But<WG1161> blessed<WG3107> are your<WG5216> eyes,<WG3788> for<WG3754> they see;<WG991> and<WG2532> your<WG5216> ears,<WG3775> for<WG3754> they hear.<WG191>

For<WG1063> most certainly<WG281> I tell<WG3756> you<WG5213> that<WG3754> many<WG4183> prophets<WG4396> and<WG2532> righteous<WG1342> men desired<WG1937> to see<WG1492> the things which<WG3739> you see,<WG1492> and<WG2532> didn't<WG3756> see<WG991> them;<WG2532> and to hear<WG191> the things which<WG3739> you hear,<WG191> and<WG2532> didn't<WG3756> hear them.<WG191>
"Hear,<WG191> then,<WG3767> the parable<WG3850> of the farmer.<WG4687>

When anyone<WG3956> hears<WG191> the word<WG3056> of the Kingdom,<WG932> and<WG2532> doesn't<WG3361> understand<WG4920> it,<WG4190> the evil one comes,<WG2064> and<WG2532> snatches away<WG726> that which has been sown<WG4687> in<WG1722> his<WG846> heart.<WG2588> This<WG3778> is<WG2076> what was sown<WG4687> by<WG3844> the roadside.<WG3598>

What<WG1161> was sown<WG4687> on<WG1909> the rocky places,<WG4075> this<WG3778> is<WG2076> he who hears<WG191> the word,<WG3056> and<WG2532> immediately<WG2532> with<WG3326> joy<WG5479> receives<WG2983> it;<WG846>

yet<WG1161> he<WG2192> has no<WG3756> root<WG4491> in<WG1722> himself,<WG1438> but<WG235> endures<WG2076> for a while.<WG4340> When<WG1161> oppression<WG2347> or<WG2228> persecution<WG1375> arises<WG1096> because of<WG1223> the word,<WG3056> immediately<WG2117> he stumbles.<WG4624>

What<WG1161> was sown<WG4687> among<WG1519> the thorns,<WG173> this is<WG2076> he<WG3778> who hears<WG191> the word,<WG3056> but<WG2532> the cares<WG3308> of this<WG5127> age<WG165> and<WG2532> the deceitfulness<WG539> of riches<WG4149> choke<WG4846> the word,<WG3056> and<WG2532> he becomes<WG1096> unfruitful.<WG175>

What<WG1161> was sown<WG4687> on<WG1909> the<WG1093> good<WG2570> ground,<WG1093> this is<WG2076> he<WG3778> who hears<WG191> the word,<WG3056> and<WG2532> understands<WG4920> it,<WG3739> who most certainly<WG1211> bears fruit,<WG2592> and<WG2532> brings forth,<WG3303> some<WG3739> one hundred<WG1161> times as much,<WG3739> some sixty,<WG1161> and some<WG3739> thirty.<WG5144>"

He set another<WG243> parable<WG3850> before<WG3908> them,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> "The Kingdom<WG932> of Heaven<WG3772> is like a<WG3666> man<WG444> who sowed<WG4687> good<WG2570> seed<WG4690> in<WG1722> his<WG846> field,<WG68>

but<WG1161> while<WG1722> people<WG444> slept,<WG2518> his<WG846> enemy<WG2190> came<WG2064> and<WG2532> sowed<WG4687> darnel<WG2215> weeds<WG303> also among<WG3319> the wheat,<WG4621> and<WG2532> went away.<WG565>
But<WG1161> when<WG3753> the blade<WG5528> sprang up<WG985> and<WG2532> brought forth<WG4160> fruit,<WG2590> then<WG5119> the darnel<WG2215> weeds appeared<WG5316> also.<WG2532>

The<WG1161> servants<WG1401> of the householder<WG3617> came<WG4334> and said<WG2036> to him,<WG846> <WG2962> 'Sir, didn't<WG3780> you<WG4687> sow<WG4687> good<WG2570> seed<WG4690> in<WG1722> your<WG4674> field?<WG68> Where<WG4159> did<WG3767> this darnel<WG2215> come from?<WG2192>'

"He said<WG5346> to them,<WG846> <WG2190> 'An enemy has<WG444> done<WG4160> this.<WG1161>' "The servants<WG1401> asked<WG2036> him,<WG846> <WG2309> 'Do you want<WG3767> us to go<WG565> and gather<WG4816> them<WG846> up?<WG4816>'

which<WG3739> indeed<WG3303> is<WG2076> smaller<WG3398> than all<WG3956> seeds.<WG4690> But<WG1161> when<WG3752> it is<WG2076> grown,<WG837> it is<WG2076> greater<WG3173> than the herbs,<WG3001> and<WG2532> becomes a tree,<WG1186> so that<WG5620> the birds<WG4071> of the air<WG3772> come<WG2064> and<WG2532> lodge<WG2681> in<WG1722> its<WG846> branches.<WG2798>"

Jesus<WG2424> spoke all<WG3956> these things<WG5023> in<WG1722> parables<WG3850> to the multitudes;<WG3793> and<WG2532> without<WG5565> a parable,<WG3850> he<WG2980> didn't<WG3756> speak to them,<WG846>

that<WG3704> it might be fulfilled<WG4137> which was spoken<WG4483> through<WG1223> the prophet,<WG4396> saying,<WG3004> "I will open<WG455> my<WG3450> mouth<WG4750> in<WG1722> parables;<WG3850> I will utter<WG2044> things hidden<WG2928> from<WG575> the foundation<WG2602> of the world.<WG2889>"

He answered<WG611> them,<WG846> "He who sows<WG4687> the good<WG2570> seed<WG4690> is<WG2076> the Son<WG5207> of Man,<WG444>

the field<WG68> is<WG2076> the world;<WG1161> and the good<WG2570> seed,<WG4690> these<WG3778> are<WG1526> the children<WG5207> of the Kingdom;<WG932> and the darnel<WG2215> weeds are<WG1526> the children<WG5207> of the evil one.<WG4190>

The enemy<WG2190> who sowed<WG4687> them<WG846> is<WG2076> the devil.<WG1161> The harvest<WG2326> is<WG2076> the end<WG4930> of the age,<WG165> and<WG1161> the reapers<WG2327> are<WG1526> angels.<WG32>

As<WG5618> therefore<WG3767> the darnel<WG2215> weeds are gathered<WG4816> up and<WG2532> burned<WG2618> with fire;<WG4442> so<WG3779> will it be<WG2071> at<WG1722> the end<WG4930> of this<WG5127> age.<WG165>

The Son<WG5207> of Man<WG444> will send out<WG649> his<WG846> angels,<WG32> and<WG2532> they will gather<WG4816> out of<WG1537> his<WG846> Kingdom<WG932> all<WG3956> things that cause stumbling,<WG4625> and<WG2532> those who do<WG4160> iniquity,<WG458>
and<WG2532> will cast<WG906> them<WG846> into<WG1519> the furnace<WG2575> of fire.<WG4442> There<WG1563> will be<WG2071> weeping<WG2805> and<WG2532> the gnashing<WG1030> of teeth.<WG3599>

Then<WG5119> the<WG1584> righteous<WG1342> will shine forth<WG1584> like the sun<WG2246> in<WG1722> the Kingdom<WG932> of<WG3962> their<WG846> Father.<WG3962> He who has<WG2192> ears<WG3775> to hear,<WG191> let him hear.<WG191>

"Again,<WG3825> the Kingdom<WG932> of Heaven<WG3772> is<WG2076> like a<WG3664> treasure<WG2344> hidden<WG2928> in<WG1722> the field,<WG68> which<WG3739> a man<WG444> found,<WG2147> and hid.<WG2928> In<WG846> his<WG575> joy,<WG5479> he goes<WG5217> and<WG2532> sells<WG4453> all<WG3956> that<WG3745> he has,<WG2192> and<WG2532> buys<WG59> that<WG3745> field.<WG68>

who<WG3739> having found<WG2147> one<WG1520> pearl<WG3135> of great price,<WG4186> he went<WG565> and sold<WG4097> all<WG3956> that<WG3745> he had,<WG2192> and<WG2532> bought<WG59> it.<WG846>

"Again,<WG3825> the Kingdom<WG932> of Heaven<WG3772> is<WG2076> like a<WG3664> dragnet,<WG4522> that was cast<WG906> into<WG1519> the sea,<WG2281> and<WG2532> gathered<WG4863> some fish of<WG1537> every<WG3956> kind,<WG1085>

which,<WG3739> when<WG3753> it was filled,<WG4137> they drew<WG307> up on<WG1909> the beach.<WG123> They<WG2532> sat down,<WG2523> and gathered<WG4816> the good<WG2570> into<WG1519> containers,<WG30> but<WG1161> the bad<WG4550> they threw<WG906> away.<WG1854>

So<WG3779> will it be<WG2071> in<WG1722> the end<WG4930> of the world.<WG165> The angels<WG32> will come forth,<WG1831> and<WG2532> separate<WG1342> the wicked<WG4190> from<WG1537> among<WG3319> the righteous,<WG1342>
and<WG2532> will cast<WG906> them<WG846> into<WG1519> the furnace<WG2575> of fire.<WG4442> There<WG1563> will be<WG2071> the weeping<WG2805> and<WG2532> the gnashing<WG1030> of teeth.<WG3599>"
Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> "Have you understood<WG4920> all<WG3956> these things?<WG5023>" They answered<WG3004> him,<WG846> "Yes,<WG3483> Lord.<WG2962>"

He<WG2036> said to them,<WG1223> "Therefore,<WG5124> every<WG3956> scribe<WG1122> who has been made a disciple<WG3100> in the Kingdom<WG932> of Heaven<WG3772> is<WG2076> like a<WG3664> man<WG444> who is a householder,<WG3617> who<WG3748> brings out<WG1544> of<WG1537> his<WG846> treasure<WG2344> new<WG2537> and<WG2532> old things.<WG3820>"
It<WG2532> happened<WG1096> that when<WG3753> Jesus<WG2424> had finished<WG5055> these<WG3778> parables,<WG3850> he departed<WG3332> from there.<WG1564>

Coming<WG2064> into<WG1519> his own<WG846> country,<WG3968> he taught<WG1321> them<WG846> in<WG1722> their<WG846> synagogue,<WG4864> so that<WG5620> they<WG846> were astonished,<WG1605> and<WG2532> said,<WG3004> "Where<WG4159> did this<WG5129> man get this<WG5129> wisdom,<WG4678> and<WG2532> these mighty works?<WG1411>

Isn't<WG3756> this<WG3778> the<WG5207> carpenter<WG5045>'s son?<WG5207> Isn't<WG3780> his<WG846> mother<WG3384> called<WG3004> Mary,<WG3137> and<WG2532> his<WG846> brothers,<WG80> James,<WG2385> Joses,<WG2500> Simon,<WG4613> and<WG2532> Judas?<WG2455>
Aren't<WG3780> all<WG3956> of his<WG846> sisters<WG79> with<WG4314> us?<WG2248> Where<WG4159> then<WG3767> did this<WG5129> man get all<WG3956> of these things?<WG5023>"

They<WG2532> were offended<WG4624> by<WG1722> him.<WG846> But<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> to them,<WG846> "A prophet<WG4396> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> without honor,<WG1487> except<WG3361> in<WG1722> his own<WG846> country,<WG3968> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> his own<WG846> house.<WG3614>"
He<WG2532> didn't<WG3756> do<WG4160> many<WG4183> mighty works<WG1411> there<WG1563> because of<WG1223> their<WG846> unbelief.<WG570>
